item.title: John the Bastard
item.description: John the Bastard is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Armando Crispino and starring John Richardson.

item.title: A Bullet for the General
item.description: A Bullet for the General is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Damiano Damiani starring Gian Maria Volonté, Lou Castel, Klaus Kinski and Martine Beswick. The film tells the story of El Chuncho, a bandit, and Bill Tate, who is a counter-revolutionary in Mexico. Chuncho soon learns that social revolution is more important than mere money.
